string.value: |Strange, the sky is different here... But it’s no time to enjoy the view. I must find someone to ask questions. I guess they already found me.
|Good day to you. I am looking for Axel. Don’t you happen to know him by any chance?
STRANGER|Axel is the greatest leader of all! He is leading us to the victory and the prosperity!
|Hem... He is a big man as I can see. How may I meet him?
STRANGER|So you are not the agitator? Damn, I thought you were sent to check our morale. Anyway I have nothing to be afraid of. I am a loyal soldier!
|I heard a lot about your leader and I really need to shake hands with him.
STRANGER|No one can see him but a war hero. But you clearly do not qualify.
|I guess I'll try to get there after all. Since you don't know anything, I'll look for someone who can help me.
STRANGER|Wait, who are you anyway? How did you get through the tunnel?
|What business is it of yours? I'm a free wanderer: I go wherever I want!
STRANGER|I protect my country from people like you: spies and provocateurs!
STRANGER|You're a tough guy, I see. If you need a job, go to Marezzia, we have headquarters there.
|Not in this life.
RADIO|Soldier! The enemy is attacking the village and your car is the closest to the hot spot. Protect the villagers until reinforcements arrive!
|I hate this bandit scum so much!
|Here come the reinforcements! Over here, guys! Give them hell.
CIT SOLDIER|You did a good job. Go back to the base. You'll be rewarded and given a new assignment.
|Humanitarian aid will help people in this village.
|These people are suffering. I feel that my actions is helping them.
|I will cleanse this land of bandits!
|Now not only bandits can go through the tunnel, but all free people! I'll go back to headquarters with a report. Let them send their men to arrange everything here in a new way.
RADIO|You are a true hero, and our leaders want to entrust you with a mission that even I don't know about. Go straight to Helvetia. Transmitting coordinates. Over.
CIT SOLDIER|We'll deal with the guards, and you'll capture CD General. He rides in a personal car, you'll recognize him right away.
|The general is in our hands! They'll make him spill everything he knows about Axel!
|Now Lisa won't run away from me! All that remains is to find out from the locals where she is hiding.
|Hi! Do you know a girl named Lisa? Can you tell me where to find her?
STRANGER|Who doesn't know Lisa! But it's going to be hard to get to her. She's friends with Axel, our commander.
|So I should have a heart-to-heart talk with him then.
STRANGER|Ha-ha-ha! That's funny! There's no chance for you to see him! Only those who perform a feat can get a reward from his hands. But you obviously can't.
|It’s a way to go.
|Lisa! I got you, you liar! Now I won't let you go so easily! You'll answer for everything!
LISA|You're so stubborn. It looks like I'll have to teach you a lesson to get you off my back.
ALICE|Wait! I’ll tell you everything...
|If you betray be one more time, I swear I will kill you! Who killed my father? Answer me!
ALICE|There were strange people on sand covered vehicles. I saw them going east.
|Really? To the Desert of Death? I should have guessed earlier! Liar!!! First you sent me to the west, then to the east. Where next? Right to Hell? No, there will be no next time!
ALICE|Don’t shoot! I am telling the truth! Listen to me first!
|Go on.

ALICE|All my life, I am looking for an answer to one question. Do you remember, there was a famous Explorer Ivan Go. He made many wonderful inventions and made our life better. Then suddenly he mysteriously disappeared

ALICE|Many a man tried to get on his trail. But it is me who will find him! I must prove that... Nevermind. Ivan had a family, a fife and a son. But they died not long before his disappearance. I spend years in quest for clues.

LISA|Many have tried to find him, but no one has succeeded. For years I searched for clues, until just recently I managed to get information about Ivan's old friend. Then I went to the city of Sowth to find him...
|But you didn't know exactly where to look. So you put on this charade for me to show you all the local villages!
LISA|Yes. But I was late...

|To kill the last witness, someone destroyed an entire village. My village! What kind of man would do such a thing?! Ivan must have discovered something very important, and now someone is trying to cover up all traces. I must find out who's behind all this!
ALICE|Right you are! Ivan may even be still alive and imprisoned by these murderers.
|I must find out who are behind it all!!
LISA|We must. I can see that you are as close to the goal as anyone. Please let me go with you to see the completion of my efforts.
|What clue are you talking about?

ALICE|I was the first one to search the burnt village and I found a disk near the dead witness. I asked here and there and found out that the disk is a kind of book! But I am afraid the only way to read it is to ask the help of the Oracle.
|It's decided, let's go on a search together!
|All right, let us stick together for a while. Where does this Oracle of yours live?
LISA|There is an underground passage leading to Oracle Island nearby. Only it seems to be guarded.
|It is not a problem. After Axel’s defeat I am a hero of the country and any soldiers will let me pass.
ALICE|The problem is that the guardian is not entirely human. You can see it by yourself.
|The job is done! The caravan is stopped. I can go back to base.
|Who are you and why are you hiding here when my race are suffering?
NJERI|We are Njeri, guests from distant worlds. By the will of fate, our eternal path crossed the trajectory of your planet. And it has brought only sorrow to all.
|One of your mechanisms is poisoning this planet, and I want to know why it's happening!

NJERI|A cargo transport was hit by an Earth weapon and crashed to the planet's surface. While we were planning a rescue operation, a device designed to operate in open space away from living matter was turned on by Earthlings.
|What kind of device was it? What were the consequences of its operation?

NJERI|The technical details won't tell you anything. The consequences are devastating for all living creatures. Only the most resilient organisms, including humans, managed to adapt and, having changed, survive in the new conditions.
|I admit that both of our races are to blame for what happened... But you knew what was happening and you did nothing!

NJERI|We have been here for many years to correct the evil caused by our technology. Alas, our progress so far has been very poor. The fact is that the device that caused the catastrophe is designed for autonomous operation and cannot be turned off.
|It's all just words! What prevents you from destroying the emitter?

NJERI|It is unpredictable what effect the sudden change in the information field will have on the survivors. It could be the last straw and kill everyone. But humanity's resource is not limitless, and after a while even the most resilient among you will no longer be able to exist.
|There must be some way out! After all these years you've already found a solution, tell me what needs to be done!
NJERI|We were able to develop a device that will slowly reduce emission levels while we investigate the changes that are happening to people.
|Everything is clear. I was already there, and nothing happened to me. So I can deliver your blocker.
NJERI|We hoped for your help. You are the last resort of mankind.
ORACLE|... Error ... in calculations… The jamming isn’t... the second base...
|Holy shit!
|The aliens used the energy of Seil to disguise themselves.
Now that they’ve revealed themselves, I’m gonna interfere with their plans!
|Looks like something has gone wrong… I gotta go there! Nothing surprises me anymore.
Now the world will be cleansed from the contamination, and the people will be able to breathe air again.
|I have the jewelry box now.
You failed to protect the caravan.
Do you wish to leave this area?
|I don't know where this road leads, so I'll stay here.
|It's a strange place. I'd better stay away from here.

The fall of Njeri’s outpost gave the Oracle a major advantage. The first thing it did was taking control over the orbital arsenal and dropping a nuclear bomb on Zarmek. The destruction of the contamination source came as a shock to most people. Not everyone recovered from it: the radiation became too deeply rooted in human mind and body. In an attempt to repair the harm, the supercomputer penetrated into all spheres of human life. It recreated all kinds of useful devices, which were supposed to help the survivors in their everyday tasks. But not all people accepted the changes. Some of them refused to take the Oracle’s gifts and returned to their simple life. Every now and then somebody would miss the voice in the head that was constantly whispering of ascension.
